name: Hentai Bella
description:
"Hentai Bella" is a unique puzzle in which the image is divided into 8 pieces and the player should move the puzzle pieces of the playing field to restore the original image.
This is a simple, exciting game that requires logical thinking and the ability to plan your actions.
Enjoy the game process to reproduce photos of beautiful girls and relax with relaxing music. The game also has a "GOD" mode, try it if you tired of collecting puzzles.
  • 10 levels
  • 10 achievements
  • Relaxing and romantic music
